Pricebook2History.name: Pricebook2History
Pricebook2History.description: Represents historical information about changes that have been made to the standard fields of the associated Pricebook2, or to any custom fields with history tracking enabled.

Pricebook2Id.description: ID of the Pricebook2 associated with this record.

DataType.description: Data type of the field that was changed.

Field.description: Name of the price book field that was modified, or a special value to indicate some other modification to the price book.

IsDeleted.description: Indicates whether the object has been moved to the Recycle Bin (true) or not (false). This is a standard system field. Label is Deleted.

NewValue.description: New value of the modified price book field. Maximum of 255 characters.

OldValue.description: Previous value of the modified price book field. Maximum of 255 characters.
